https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hShTeAt2Xh2bUBOVjswPUgRQsvF.jpg Mia Hansen-Løve's debut begins her career-long chronicle of a family. In this short film, a father breaks the news to his children that he and their mother are separating - the repercussions of which surface everywhere elsewhere in Hansen-Løve's filmography, in particular her most recent feature Things To Come (2016), for which she won the Silver Bear at the 2016 Berlinale Après mûre réflexion
